channel.title: Moo! - Michiel van der Meer
channel.description: Recent content on Moo! - Michiel van der Meer

item.title: ArgMining22 Shared Task
item.description: With colleagues from CLTL at the VU Amsterdam, we participated and achieved 1st place in the Argument Mining Workshop 2022 Shared Task.

item.title: Collaborative fake news detection with AI
item.description: My participation in H3AI ended up in the first place! We designed, implemented a prototype and presented an approach for hybrid (human + AI) fact checking for combating fake news.

item.title: VBDA-reddit
item.description: Gathering post information for research purposes on online discussions. More information to come.

item.title: Learning to Ask Timely Questions in a Collaborative Grounded Language Understanding Task
item.description: Artificial agents benefit from asking questions to human instructors at the right time, can predictive uncertainty be used to find the right time? Joint work with my colleagues from Hybrid Intelligence: Kata Naszadi, Taewoon Kim, Putra Manggala. Link to the two-page abstract: here.

item.title: What Values Should an Agent Align with?
item.description: Link to the paper: here. @article{liscio2022values, author={Enrico Liscio and Michiel van der Meer and Luciano C. Siebert and Catholijn M. Jonker and Pradeep K. Murukannaiah}, journal={Autonomous Agents and Multi-Agent Systems}, title={What Values should an Agent Align with? An Empirical Comparison of General and Context-Specific Values}, year={2022}, volume={36}, number={1}, pages={23}, doi = {10.1007/s10458-022-09550-0}, isbn = {1573-7454}, keywords={Values, ethics, Schwartz, context, Axies, NLP}, short_name = {JAAMAS}, }

item.title: HyEnA: A Hybrid Method for Extracting Arguments from Opinions
item.description: My work on extracting arguments from an opinion corpus using a hybrid (human + AI) approach. Link to the paper: here How to cite @inproceedings{vandermeer2022hyena, address = {Amsterdam, the Netherlands}, author = {van der Meer, Michiel and Liscio, Enrico and Jonker, Catholijn M. and Plaat, Aske and Vossen, Piek and Murukannaiah, Pradeep K.}, booktitle = {Proceedings of the first International Conference on Hybrid Human-Artificial Intelligence (HHAI 2022)}, pages = {1--15}, publisher = {IOS Press}, title = {HyEnA: A Hybrid Method for Extracting Arguments from Opinions}, year = {2022} } Supplementary material Description and additional results: Includes a richer description of the HyEnA experiments, including inter-rater reliability (IRR) metrics, the full key argument lists and details on the implementation of the baselines.

item.title: Reason Against the Machine: Future Directions for Mass Online Deliberation
item.description: Review paper on the design elements in deliberation platforms. Link to the paper: here.

item.title: HOVO
item.description: Dit college vond plaats in de een collegeserie van Maieutiek aan de HOVO, die gaat over de rol van AI en algoritmes in de samenleving: De Mens: een Algoritme met Huidhonger. Maieutiek biedt filosofische kennis waarmee mensen zelf in de praktijk aan de slag kunnen. Het college vond plaats in Groningen op 2021-11-17 en in Amsterdam op 2021-11-22. Links Link naar de presentatie slides. Tegenlicht documentaire Reactie op Tegenlicht docu -> Zie onder Boeken Homo Deus van Yuval Noah Harari Klara and the Sun van Kazuo Ishiguro I, Robot van Isaac Asimov Reactie op Tegenlicht “Digimens” geschreven op 2021-12-05 door Michiel van der Meer en Sabina van Rooij

item.title: Axies
item.description: Below you will find all the values relevant in this experiment. Please use it as a reference if you want to find out more about the values you encounter. 0 - Hedonism pleasure, enjoying life, self-indulgent Defining goal: pleasure or sensuous gratification for oneself. 1 - Mental health mentally, stress, Mental damage, positivity, living alone, psychic injury, stress, physical proximity, mental complaints, tension, spiritual relaxation, quality of life, psychiatry, loneliness, walk around, visit ill people in nursery home, cheer up, last days, empathy, compassion, last phase of life, psychologist, personal care

item.title: Global Game Jam 2020
item.description: During the 2020 Global Game Jam, my team and I worked on Re-Pair, a retro RTS in Pico-8. The goal of the game is to pair up units into bigger ones, and defeat the evil forces. Your territory grows by scouting with small units, so don’t pair them all! You can play it below. Since it requires a mouse to be played, play it in your browser! var canvas = document.

item.title: Exploiting Language Instructions for Interpretable and Compositional Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Attempt to interpret the latent space from an RL agent to identify its current objective in a complex language instruction. This work followed my master thesis at the UvA. Link to the paper: here.

item.title: RaLLy
item.description: I experimented with creating an OpenAI gym environment for the Rocket League Bot project. I forked the RLBot repo here, the gym environment can be found here and the DDPG implementation of a bot is on here.

item.title: Master thesis
item.description: I’m currently working on my master thesis in Reinforcement Learning on the topics of exploration strategies, compositionality and hierarchical models. My fork of ILLC’s machine can be found here. In addition, I push my utility files to an extra repo: turbo-goggles.

item.title: launch_ext
item.description: I made an space launch tracker extension for Google Chrome using LaunchLibrary!

item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: My laptop runs i3 on Ubuntu, so I’ve started a repo for keeping track of my window manager configuration.

item.title: Dutch Nao Team
item.description: I have been a part of the Dutch Nao Team since 2015, participating in the RoboCup Standard Platform League. I’ve been on multiple trips with my team, which has led me to quite a lot of different places: Techfest IIT, Mumbai, India (2015-2016) RoboCup European Open, Eindhoven, Netherlands (2016) RoboCup Leipzig, Germany (2016) RoHOW, Hamburg, Germany (2016) RoboCup Iran Open, Teheran, Iran (2017) RoboCup Nagoya, Japan (2017) RoHOW, Hamburg, Germany (2017) RoboCup Montreal, Canada (2018) Messe Dornbirn, Austria (2018) RoHOW, Hamburg, Germany (2018) Inside the team I was involved with the creation of our own framework, as well as leading the project group on automation.

item.title: ShareLatex scraper
item.description: I made a ShareLatex scraper, to download all my projects’ source files for a local backup.

item.title: language-netlogo
item.description: I created the NetLogo language package for Atom!

item.title: Ducks
item.description: Joe
